text: 24.47: Ais 49.6; 49.22; Jer 31.34; Mai 4.2; Mal 1.11; Mt 28.19; 1 T 3.16Ana taagip khavgirga, mbe ana zɨn panan, mbe kha Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ga suanga, mbe ndavi domdorɨrga, Fhe Bakɨme mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzɨv, nta ndɨkndɨgɨ tharga. Mbe fharav Zerusareman kegɨp, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun suaŋri.
